title: Inception
overview: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing tech is given a chance to erase his past if he can plant an idea into a CEO's mind.

title: Interstellar
overview: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

title: The Dark Knight
overview: Batman faces the Joker, a criminal mastermind who plunges Gotham into anarchy.

title: The Matrix
overview: A hacker learns the reality he lives in is a simulation and joins a rebellion.

title: The Matrix Reloaded
overview: Neo and the rebels race against time before the machines discover Zion.

title: The Matrix Revolutions
overview: The final battle for Zion as Neo faces Agent Smith one last time.

title: The Prestige
overview: Two rival magicians engage in a battle to create the ultimate illusion.

title: Memento
overview: A man with short-term memory loss uses notes and tattoos to hunt for his wife's killer.

title: Tenet
overview: An agent manipulates time to prevent World War III.

title: Dunkirk
overview: Allied soldiers are evacuated from Dunkirk during World War II.

title: Avatar
overview: A paraplegic Marine on an alien planet becomes torn between following orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

title: Avatar: The Way of Water
overview: Jake Sully lives with his newfound family on Pandora and must fight to protect them.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy
overview: A group of intergalactic criminals must pull together to stop a fanatical warrior.

title: Guardians of the Galaxy Vol. 2
overview: The Guardians struggle to keep their newfound family together and unravel Peter Quill's parentage.

title: Iron Man
overview: After being held captive, Tony Stark builds a suit of armor to fight evil.

title: Iron Man 2
overview: Tony Stark faces new enemies while the world demands to know his Iron Man secrets.

title: Iron Man 3
overview: Tony Stark confronts demons from his past after a terrorist attack.

title: The Avengers
overview: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop Loki and his alien army.

title: Avengers: Age of Ultron
overview: The Avengers must stop Ultron, a rogue AI bent on human extinction.

title: Avengers: Infinity War
overview: The Avengers face their deadliest foe, Thanos, who seeks the Infinity Stones.

title: Avengers: Endgame
overview: The remaining Avengers assemble once more to reverse Thanos's actions and restore balance.

title: Blade Runner
overview: A blade runner must pursue and terminate four replicants who stole a ship in space.

title: Blade Runner 2049
overview: A young blade runner discovers a secret that could plunge what's left of society into chaos.

title: Her
overview: A lonely writer develops an unlikely relationship with an operating system.

title: Ex Machina
overview: A programmer is invited to administer a Turing test to an intelligent humanoid A.I.

title: Wall-E
overview: A small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will decide the fate of mankind.

title: Inside Out
overview: After young Riley is uprooted from her Midwest life, her emotions conflict on how best to navigate a new city.

title: Coco
overview: Aspiring musician Miguel enters the Land of the Dead to find his great-great-grandfather, a legendary singer.

title: Spirited Away
overview: A young girl enters a world ruled by gods, witches, and spirits.

title: Your Name
overview: Two teenagers share a profound connection upon discovering they are swapping bodies.

title: La La Land
overview: A jazz pianist and an aspiring actress fall in love while pursuing their dreams.

title: Whiplash
overview: A promising young drummer enrolls at a cut-throat music conservatory.

title: Parasite
overview: Greed and class discrimination threaten the relationship between two families.

title: The Social Network
overview: Harvard student Mark Zuckerberg creates what would become Facebook.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
overview: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years.

title: The Godfather
overview: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his empire to his reluctant son.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
overview: A meek Hobbit sets out on a journey to destroy a powerful ring.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers
overview: The Fellowship is broken but continues its quest against Sauron.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King
overview: The final confrontation for Middle-earth.

title: Star Wars: A New Hope
overview: Luke Skywalker joins forces to save Princess Leia and defeat the Empire.

title: Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back
overview: The Empire pursues the Rebel Alliance across the galaxy.

title: Star Wars: Return of the Jedi
overview: The Rebel Alliance launches a final stand against the Empire.

title: The Lion King
overview: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle.

title: Toy Story
overview: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened by a new spaceman figure.

title: Toy Story 3
overview: The toys are mistakenly delivered to a day-care center.

title: Finding Nemo
overview: After his son is captured, clownfish Marlin sets out to find him.

title: Up
overview: 78-year-old Carl ties thousands of balloons to his house and flies away.

title: Ratatouille
overview: A rat who can cook makes an unusual alliance with a young kitchen worker.

title: Black Panther
overview: T'Challa returns home to Wakanda to serve as the new king.
